lines: CS 566AH 352SDAH 573
155NDAUNKA NKOYANDA
IÕLL GO WHERE YOU WANT ME TO GO
Doh is F
Nokutabi mu malundu na ba atala a lwizi;
Nokutabi kulwana nkondo, Mwami ulandiita,
Naakuti wandiita kuunka, koonse oko nkwetazyi;
Ndiya kuvuna ku Mwami, ÒNditume konse nkoyanda ndiunke.Ó
CIINDULULO:
Ndilaunka konse nkondituma, Mumalundu, a mulwizi;
Ndila kanana zyoonse nzyondituma, Ndila kuba
Mbondiyanda.
Antela ndielede kwaamba majwi a Jesu, Ngayanda;
Nakuba mubisyi mucibi ngwetikayandaule;
Muvuni ba mugwasyi wangu, Nzila noisiya mbi;
Ndila tola mulumbe mubotu, Ndilakanana ncoyanda.
Kuli munzi mumuunda wakwe, Kutebula takuko;
Oko nkwetibelekele lyoonse, A Jesu wakayaswa,
Ndisyome mu luse lwa Jesu, A kuzyiba luyando,
Ndila cita luyando lwako, Ndila kuba mbondiyanda.
